messages.subject: math games - countdown
messages.msgSnippet: Somebody on this list mentioned CountDown by Cadaco. I bought this game at Target and really like it. It is simple simple simple - but somehow a bit
messages.messageBody:
Somebody on this list mentioned "CountDown" by Cadaco. I bought this
game at Target and really like it. It is simple simple simple - but
somehow a bit addicting. This is especially good for kids who are busy
enjoying learning all the basic "math facts."

The reason I like it so much is that it has a lot of scope for "playing
around" with the rules - make up your own varations.

I have some variations of this on my blog -
<http://homepage.mac.com/pamsoroosh/iblog/index.html>

Or - just go to <www.sandradodd.com/math> where you'll find a link!!

-pam
National Home Education Network
<www.NHEN.org>
Serving the entire homeschooling community since 1999
through information, networking and public relations.
